summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6033 for the improvement of Magnolia Boulevard from West Dravus Street to West Howe Street at 34th Avenue West, and from West Howe Street at Clise Place to West Galer Street at 29th Avenue West; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 81858, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
